channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText™ -- Documentum™ Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText™ -- Documentum™ Server

item.title: CVE-2024-4188|2024-07-31T18:18:24.029Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- documentum%E2%84%A2%20server
item.description: Unprotected Transport of Credentials vulnerability in OpenText™ Documentum™ Server could allow Credential Stuffing.This issue affects Documentum™ Server: from 16.7 through 23.4.
